member.remarks: This setting is ignored if DevTools is attached to

member.name: P:Avalonia.Diagnostics.DevToolsOptions.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial size of the DevTools window. The default value is 1280x720.

member.summary: Get or set the startup screen index where the DevTools window will be displayed.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Diagnostics.DevToolsOptions.ShowImplementedInterfaces
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether DevTools should be displayed implemented interfaces on Control details. The default value is true.
